short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Collect and organize web content in plain files.
short.de: Sammle und organisiere Webinhalte in einfachen Dateien.
short.es: Recoger y organizar el contenido web en archivos planos
short.fr: Recueillir et organiser contenu d'Internet dans des fichiers simples
short.it: Colleziona e organizza contenuti web in semplici file.
short.ja: ウェブコンテンツをプレーンファイルで収集整理します。
short.no: Samle og organiser nettinnhold enkle filer
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Recolher e organizar conteúdo web em ficheiros simples.
short.ru: Собирайте и организуйте веб-контент в виде простых файлов.
short.tr: Web (Ağ) içeriklerini boş dosyaya topla ve organize et.
short.zh_CN: 使用纯文本收集和组织网页内容
short.zh_TW: 蒐集與組織網頁內容到文字檔

long.ar:
What is TagSpaces?
- A web content scraper, capturing the content as local file in HTML and MHTML file formats or taking a screenshot of the visible tab area in PNG format.
- A file browser and file manager, which allows you to navigate and organize your local files with the help of tags.
- An extensible platform providing a consistent, cross-platform user interface for your files.
- A purely offline running application, which is internet independent
- A projector of your local files to Google's Chromacast

** PLEASE NOTE: **
In order to browse your local files with this extension you have to select the "Allow access to file URLs" in the extension manager of Chrome.
** PLEASE NOTE: **

Key features:
- File and directory browsing
- Integrated Image, PDF, Markdown, JSON, HTML and other viewers
- Integrated music and video player, able to play all the file formats supported natively by Chrome (e.g. WEBM, OGG, OGV ...) 
- Simple source code viewer for the most common programming languages 

Key use cases:
- Browsing and viewing of your local files directly in the browser without external applications
- Streaming your local content such as music, images, videos or documents to your Chromecast 
- Creating web snippets and screenshots from web pages
- Visualizing of your directory structures and files

TagSpaces is available for free as native application for Windows, Mac OS X, Linux and also as Firefox Addon. There are also a free Android and iOS apps.
long.am,bn,da,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,et,fi,:
What is TagSpaces Web Clipper?
A web scraper, capturing the content of the currently opened web page as a plain local files (HTML, MHTML, PNG, URL), which can be later opened with any program supporting the file format.

Does it require registration?
No, this is a completely serverless extension – there's no backend, no cloud and no data collection, enjoy your privacy!

Can I add tags to the scraped content?
Yes, while saving the content, you will be provided with a place, where you can enter tags, which can be later shown in the TagSpaces desktop application.

Key features:
- Save the current webpage as MHTML file for preserving the original graphic design 
- Save the current webpage as HTML with embedding images - suitable for content which you want to comment or change later in tools like the TagSpaces desktop app.
- Save the currently selected part of a given web page as HTML, allowing to extract just important for you part of the content.
- Take a screenshot of the current webpage as PNG file
- Saving the current web site as bookmark containing the it current Internet address (URL) and a screenshot, useful for collecting bookmarks 
- Extract geo coordinates from the URLs of web mapping services, allowing to save location which you can recall later in the TagSpaces' Mapique perspective.
- Support for geo tagging with Plus Codes (open location codes)
 
TagSpaces is available for free also as a desktop application for Windows, macOS, Linux and as a mobile app for Android.
long.bg,ca,cs,el,es,fr,hu,it,ja,ko,pt_BR,pt_P:
What is TagSpaces?
- An open source file browser, which allows you to navigate and organize your local files with the help of tags.
- An extensible platform providing a consistent, cross-platform user interface for your files.
- A purely offline running application, which is internet independent.
- A web content scraper, capturing the content as local file in HTML and MHTML file formats or taking a screenshot of the visible tab area in PNG format.


** Since the phasing out of the NPAPI support in Chrome, TagSpaces is not able anymore to write and rename files on your local file system. This is the reason for the creation of TagSpaces "Light" which is only a viewer for your files. **

Key features:
- File and directory browsing
- Markdown & JSON viewer
- Simple source code viewerfor the most common programming languages 
- Integrated PDF and image viewers

Great for:
- Browsing and viewing of your local files directly in the browser without external applications
- Streaming your local images and videos to your Chromecast® device
- Creating and managing notes and web snippets (like in Evernote® but completely offline)
- Visualizing of your directory structures and files
- Creating your personal wiki system

** PLEASE NOTE: **
In order to open your local files with TagSpaces, please select the "Allow access to file URLs" in the  extension manager of chrome.
** PLEASE NOTE: **

The creation of TagSpaces was inspired by:
- Scrapbook ®
- Evernote ®
- Picasa ®
- IrfanView ®
- OwnCloud ®
- Google Desktop ®
- Unhosted.org

TagSpaces is available for free as native application for Windows, Mac OS X, Linux and also as Firefox addon. There is also a paid Android version available in Google Play.
long.de:
Was ist der TagSpaces Web Clipper?

Ein Web-Scraper, der den Inhalt der aktuell geöffneten Webseite als einfache lokale Dateien (HTML, MHTML, PNG, URL) speichert. Diese Dateien können später mit jedem Programm geöffnet werden, das das entsprechende Dateiformat unterstützt.

Benötigt die Erweiterung eine Registrierung?
* Nein, dies ist eine komplett serverlose Erweiterung – es gibt kein Backend, keine Cloud und keine Datenerfassung. Ihre Privatsphäre bleibt geschützt!

Kann ich Tags zum erfassten Inhalt hinzufügen?
* Ja, beim Speichern des Inhalts haben Sie die Möglichkeit, Tags hinzuzufügen. Diese Tags können später in der TagSpaces-Desktop-Anwendung angezeigt werden.

Hauptfunktionen:
- Speichern der aktuellen Webseite als HTML mit eingebetteten Bildern – ideal für Inhalte, die Sie später kommentieren oder in Tools wie der TagSpaces-Desktop-App bearbeiten möchten.
- Speichern der aktuellen Webseite als MHTML-Datei, um das ursprüngliche grafische Design zu bewahren.
- Speichern des aktuell ausgewählten Teils einer Webseite als HTML, sodass nur die für Sie wichtigen Inhalte extrahiert werden.
- Erstellen eines Screenshots der aktuellen Webseite als PNG-Datei.
- Speichern der aktuellen Webseite als Lesezeichen, das die Internetadresse (URL) und einen Screenshot enthält – praktisch zum Sammeln von Lesezeichen.
- Extrahieren von Geokoordinaten aus URLs von Web-Mapping-Diensten, um Standorte zu speichern, die später in der Mapique-Perspektive von TagSpaces aufgerufen werden können.
- Unterstützung für Geo-Tagging mit Plus Codes (Open Location Codes).

Hinweis:
TagSpaces ist auch kostenlos als Desktop-Anwendung für Windows, macOS und Linux sowie als mobile App für Android verfügbar.
long.en:
What is TagSpaces?
- A web content scraper, capturing the content as local file in HTML and MHTML file formats or taking a screenshot of the visible tab area in PNG format.

Key features:
- Saving the content of the current tab as HTML embedding the references images
- Saving the content of the current tab as MHTML file
- Saving the content of the current selection as HTML embedding the references images
- Taking a screenshot of the current tab as PNG file

TagSpaces is available for free as desktop application for Windows, Mac OS X, Linux and also as Firefox Addon. There are also free Android and iOS apps.
long.fa,pl,sr:
What is TagSpaces?
- A web content scraper, capturing the content as local file in HTML and MHTML file formats or taking a screenshot of the visible tab area in PNG format.
- A file browser*, which allows you to navigate and organize your local files with the help of tags.
- An extensible platform providing a consistent, cross-platform user interface for your files.
- A purely offline running application, which is internet independent.

** PLEASE NOTE: **
In order to open your local files this extension, please select the "Allow access to file URLs" in the  extension manager of chrome.
** PLEASE NOTE: **

Key features:
- File and directory browsing
- Integrated Image, PDF, markdown, JSON, HTML and other viewers
- Simple source code viewer for the most common programming languages 

Great for:
- Browsing and viewing of your local files directly in the browser without external applications
- Streaming your offline music, images, videos or documents to your Chromecast® 
- Creating and managing notes and web snippets (like in Evernote® but completely offline)
- Visualizing of your directory structures and files
- Create and manage a personal wiki system

TagSpaces is available for free as native application for Windows, Mac OS X, Linux and also as Firefox addon. There is also a paid Android and iOS versions available on Google Play or Apple's appstore respectively.

*) Since the phasing out of the NPAPI support in Chrome, TagSpaces is not able anymore to write and rename files on your local file system. This is the reason for the creation of TagSpaces "Lite" as a browser for your files.
long.no:
What is TagSpaces Web Clipper?
- A web content scraper, capturing the content as local file in HTML and MHTML file formats or taking a screenshot of the visible tab area in PNG format.

Key features:
- Saving the content of the current tab as MHTML file
- Saving the content of the current tab as HTML embedding the references images
- Saving the content of the current selection as HTML embedding the references images
- Taking a screenshot of the current tab as PNG file
- Saving the current web site as URL file containing the URL and a screenshot, useful for managing bookmarks in TagSpaces 
- Extracting geo coordinates from the URLs of web mapping services 
- Added support for geo-tagging with Plus Codes (open location codes)
 
TagSpaces is available for free as desktop application for Windows, Mac OS X, Linux and also as Firefox Addon. There are also free Android app.
long.vi:
What is TagSpaces?
- A web content scraper, capturing the content as local file in HTML and MHTML file formats or taking a screenshot of the visible tab area in PNG format.
- A file browser and file manager, which allows you to navigate and organize your local files with the help of tags.
- An extensible platform providing a consistent, cross-platform user interface for your files.
- A purely offline running application, which is internet independent
- A projector of your local files to Google's Chromacast

** PLEASE NOTE: **
In order to browse your local files with this extension you MUST select the "Allow access to file URLs" in the  extension manager of Chrome.
** PLEASE NOTE: **

Key features:
- File and directory browsing
- Integrated Image, PDF, Markdown, JSON, HTML and other viewers
- Integrated music and video player, able to play all the file formats supported natively by Chrome (e.g. WEBM, OGG, OGV ...) 
- Simple source code viewer for the most common programming languages 

Key use cases:
- Browsing and viewing of your local files directly in the browser without external applications
- Streaming your local content such as music, images, videos or documents to your Chromecast 
- Creating web snippets and screenshots from web pages
- Visualizing of your directory structures and files

TagSpaces is available for free as native application for Windows, Mac OS X, Linux and also as Firefox Addon. There is also a paid Android and iOS versions.

Since the phasing out of the NPAPI support in Chrome, TagSpaces is not able any more to write and rename files on your local file system. This is the reason for downgrading TagSpaces in Chrome to a "TagSpaces Lite", which is "only" a browser and not manager for your files.
